titlestmt.titleproper:
Billie Jean King Autographed Ticket and Related Documents
1972
AHMC - King, Billie Jean
titlestmt.author: Larry Weimer

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 15:47:05 -0400.

did.unittitle: Billie Jean King autographed ticket to Grass Courts Championships and related documents
did.abstract:
4 items related to the Virginia Slims Grass Courts [Tennis] Championships held August 21-27, 1972, at the Newport Casino, Rhode Island, to benefit the National Lawn Tennis Hall of Fame. Items are: two tickets to the August 22 matches, one of which is autographed by Billie Jean King, attached to a backing board with King's photograph; the event program; and the schedule of matches for August 22.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Billie Jean King autographed ticket to Grass Courts Championships and related documents.
did.langmaterial: The documents in the collection are in English.
